title: Anchor names contain invalid characters for easy referencing
description:
In http://jakarta.apache.org/lucene/docs/queryparsersyntax.html, anchor names 
contain invalid characters for easy referencing :

<a name="Term Modifiers">
<a name="Wildcard Searches">
<a name="Fuzzy Searches">
<a name="Proximity Searches">
<a name="Range Searches">
<a name="Boosting a Term">
<a name="Boolean operators">
<a name="Field Grouping">
<a name="Escaping Special Characters">
<a name="+">

comments.content:
Lucene's HTML pages are generated from XML, using Anakia
(http://jakarta.apache.org/velocity/anakia.html), so unfortunately we cannot fix
this bug in Lucene.  It sounds like this may be a bug in Anakia.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
